page.title: 19MEDIA 2
page.content: {TV:}At least 90% of families watch TV regularly and for many people this is a major leisure & relaxation activity. 50% of families have 2 receivers & 25% have a video,both either hired or privately owned.Video films can be hired from out-of-area shops. Advertising important & significant to children. {TV PROGRAMMES & CHANNELS}ITV generally more popular than BBC.Sports, especially football,sex & violence provide popular programme material. {RADIO,LOCAL},based at Reading,Oxford & Swindon,listened to widely. {RADIO,NATIONAL:}BBC Radios 1 & 2 popular with both home & car driving public. {COUNTY LIBRARY (NEWBURY BRANCH)} popular but out of area.{Mobile {library}visits area regularly.
